Name: Familia
About the game: Tension has been building for millennia and war is on the horizon. At the center of the war, a small family tries their best to find each other. To be there for each other. Familia tells the stories from relatable characters in an unrelatable world. Mothers, fathers, sisters, brothers, and others all seeking to take back what's rightfully theirs from the tyrannical Empire. The Father The mysterious man who awoke in the desert not knowing who he is. Will he find his way home? Koko, The Daughter Constantly assumed by others to be harmless, Koko exudes limitless potential. Despite being an intellectual genius, she does lack physical strength when compared to the rest of her family. She spends most of her time with her Grandma, whom she adores. Poki, The Son Poki is a martial arts Prodigy, who longs for acknowledgment. When not looking after Koko, he trains constantly. Despite being a teenager, he feels as if he should be deployed on missions with his famed father. Keeria, The Mother Keeria is considered by many to be one of the worldâ€™s greatest assassins, which is a title, that she does not prefer. She would prefer to live out in isolation with her family for the rest of her life. She has sworn off fighting but perhaps she may not be able to uphold her vow. Expansive story Original music by acclaimed musicians Original pixel art and digital paintings An innovative experience, calling on classic RPG elements 11 playable characters Game+ mode for multiple replays and end-game content The majority of the game development was broadcasted live on Twitch ( ). The game uses both stock art and original art
